abstract: British House of Lords member John Sewel requests leave of absence while police and Parliament investigate accusations against him involving drug use and prostitutes.
lead_paragraph: Lord Sewel resigned Sunday as deputy speaker after the newspaper The Sun released images that appeared to show him in a cocaine-and-sex session.

headline.main: Britain: Lord Sewel Requests Leave Amid Sex and Drug Scandal
headline.print_headline: Europe; Britain: Lord Requests Leave Amid Sex and Drug Scandal

snippet: Lord Sewel resigned Sunday as deputy speaker after the newspaper The Sun released images that appeared to show him in a cocaine-and-sex session.
